title: Multiple Intelligences-Based Learner-Centered Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training course for pre-service and in-service teachers. Provides experiences in implementing classroom environments via VR simulations and designing learner-tailored lessons.

learning_goals: Design at least three instructional strategies applying the eight types of multiple intelligences theory to language classes
Create a profiling report analyzing individual learners' strength-based intelligences using learner diagnostic tools
Develop and implement at least two learner-centered instructional scenarios in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
